mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (report_num, reporter_num, report_content, report_type, report_typeDetail, report_category ) VALUES( report_seq.nextval, #{reporter_num}, #{report_content}, #{report_type}, #{report_typeDetail}, #{report_category} )
